```{r}
library(sunset)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

mtcars$vs   <- paste(mtcars$vs)
mtcars$gear <- paste(mtcars$gear)

g <- ggplot(mtcars) +
  aes(mpg, wt, color = vs) +
  geom_point(size = 4) +
  theme_bw()

g
```
